replies.message: The beats is weird but it will grow on me, the chorus is just Uyyy
3rd verse my favorite! Like damn bars! 🔥🔥

Lol, how do you people not realize that this is the same exact flow, just a different beat. Same song, just different lyrics. It's like he puts out the same shit every time for the past couple of years. The best thing he's done was sign yelawolf in the past 4 years.
jordan tuck, have you ever listen to marshell mathers lp 2? new sounds, new flow, dont believe listen to bazerk
Phenomenal is like reaching new heights his old shit doesn't top that

Jordan Tuck - Have you paid attention to the lyrics of his songs? How can you not hear how he has evolved since his first album? He used his music as an outlet, venting everything he has gone through, both in childhood and adulthood. People evolve, either in a good way or bad way. He uses his music now to inspire and to show others they can succeed and they too are freakin Phenomenal. He's a fucking genius. I'd like to see how you'd lay your life on the line, for millions to dissect. How would you spin it?
